title: Change overtime workday conversion to 7h30 (450 minutes) everywhere

requirements.text: Update all overtime total/conversion displays so that 1 full workday equals 7 hours 30 minutes (450 minutes) instead of 8 hours (480 minutes), including the composite total format ("X day(s), Y hour(s), Z minute(s)") and any other UI that derives days from minutes.

quotes: Change A full workday to 7 hours and 30 minutes instead of 8 hours.

acceptanceCriteria: In the overtime totals UI, composite formatting uses 450 minutes per day (not 480).
Any UI that converts minutes to days/workdays reflects 7h30 per day consistently for both Assistants and Managers (including Manager overtime views).
Composite formatting continues to use 60 minutes = 1 hour and displays negative totals with a leading '-' when applicable.

requirements.text: Ensure that changing the workday conversion rule immediately affects historical (already-recorded) overtime totals shown throughout the app, without requiring users to re-enter overtime entries.
acceptanceCriteria: After the change, the same existing overtime entries produce updated day-based/composite totals everywhere they are displayed.
No data-reset or manual user action is required to see updated totals for existing entries (refreshing the page is sufficient).

constraints: Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text introduced or changed by this work.
nonGoals: Do not change how overtime entries are stored (minutes and dates) beyond what is required for display conversion.
Do not change overtime add/deduct color semantics or the overtime entry workflow.
